name: Omocorno (Online Omok/Gomoku)
description:
This project is a simple recreation of Maplestory's minigame known as "Omok", that is also based on Gomoku, a game that is basically a tic tac toe but grid is 15x15 and you win after forming a chain of five.

Its a online multiplayer game, and you need to connect using hamachi/radmin or something like that (theres a little tutorial on menu and a tutorial video on this page)

My main reason to create this was to play with a friend, thats why there's some inside jokes thats not gonna make sense to you. 

Join this discord if you wanna ask something about this project or request a feature (that way you dont have to blindly add me as a friend on discord)

https://discord.gg/T7JWQKZYcC
